Module fypmsV2

Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationLaunchController
    A controller class for the initialisation of student, supervisor, coordinator and project collections at the start of the App.
    AuthController
    Controller class that handles requests related to authenticating a new user, updating login credentials, or accessing and updating the currently logged in Account.
    ProjectController
    This class represents the controller for managing the projects in the system.
    RequestController
    The RequestController class contains methods to handle requests made by students and supervisors, such as submitting requests and approving/rejecting them.
    SupervisorController
    This class is responsible for controlling and managing supervisors.
